name: 100% Natural and Pure Henna Cone or tube, Ready to use paste for Reddish Brown Hair Color, Long-lasting, No additives, Chemical free, Henna Hair Dye, Spot hair coloring (Pack of 6)
short_description: ★100% Pure and Natural: Our henna hair color paste cones are made from 100% pure, triple shifted henna leaves. Say goodbye to harmful chemicals and embrace a holistic approach to hair coloring. Your hair deserves the best, and that's exactly what we offer.

★Easy to use premium quality: Experience the convenience of our Pure & Natural ready-to-use henna hair color paste. Say goodbye to the complexities of mixing henna powder and embrace the ease of our henna cones. We take great care to store our henna properly, ensuring it arrives to you in its freshest form. Furthermore, it undergoes a rigorous triple-sifting process, guaranteeing a consistently smooth and hassle-free application every single time.
★Multi-Purpose: Our henna cones offer versatility like no other, whether it's concealing grays, enhancing your natural hair tone, or embarking on a stylish transformation with a fresh, vibrant shade.

★Important Note: The true beauty of our all-natural henna is that its color transformation is a patient art. You won't see the results right away; it takes 24-48 hours for the color to fully develop. The longer you leave it on, the deeper and more vibrant the color will become!
★Directions for Use: Application is a breeze - just remove the tip, and if necessary, trim it to your liking.
★Storage: To preserve their freshness, we suggest storing the cones in the refrigerator or freezer when not in use. Just allow the cones to thaw for approximately 1 hour before your next application.

name: 20pcs Empty Henna Cones | Pre-Rolled Hand Made Temporary Tattoo Ramadan Cone Set | Cellophane Applicator Dispenser for Jagua Gel Hengua Heena Beginners kit | Mehendi Drawing and Studying
short_description: THIN CELLOPHANE CONSTRUCTION: Handcrafted empty cones are made from thin cellophane, allowing for drawing very fine lines without getting hands messy.
EASY FILLING: Cones can be effortlessly filled with henna up to 2/3 of their capacity, enabling precise control over the amount of henna used.

DRAWING PRECISION: Careful twisting and trimming of the cone's tip to the desired thickness ensure high precision and control over lines while drawing. The thin cellophane helps prevent accidental hand staining, making the henna drawing experience cleaner and more enjoyable.
HANDMADE WITH LOVE: Each cone is meticulously crafted by henna artist, ensuring top-notch quality and attention to detail.
CREATIVE POSSIBILITIES: Thanks to the precise control provided by the cones, artists and enthusiasts can effortlessly create intricate and unique designs.

short_description: CHEMICAL DYE FREE - Made from all natural herbal based ingredients and from the finest pure quality henna leaves. No chemical dye added. No chemical dyes were used in the making of this product.

PACK OF 12 HENNA PASTE CONES - Each pack comes with 12 individual cones. Each individual cone comes ready to use. Each cone has a shelf life of 1 year. The cones can be refrigerated to prolong the shelf life.
LONG LASTING - Long lasting dark reddish brown color. Color darkens over time and lasts for up to 7 to 12 days and gradually fades away.

READY & EASY TO APPLY - Remove the pin from the tip of the cone and gently squeeze. Apply to desired part and let dry till the henna tends to flake off, For better results keep applied for 2-3 hours, The color immediately after removing the dried henna paste will be orange and will develop to darkest brown in 1-2 days.

PREMIUM QUALITY - premium henna cones made with, Henna Paste, Nilgiri Oil & Clove oil. These Cones are perfect for all occasions. TEST ALL TYPES OF APPLICATORS: What sets our Henna Application Kit apart is the opportunity it gives you to work and test all types of applicators.
